topic.title: Should I trust iCloud? How do you store your private keys?
topic.body:
Should I put 1Password library which is the most important data for me on iCloud?

I also put all ZeroNet private keys in 1Password. How do you guys store your private keys?

1_1KJstFfmFWuU4ttPJGMigZJgdn4gg2GZ1b.body: Linode is one of the best VPS I ever used. But it's also expensive.

23_14XxpXNGMLsyeQxikacrbQnAFXVyhN5Ngx.body: Your public and private keys are stored in data/users.json. Keep it in a safe place.
